articles.description: This Thanksgiving we got a reminder of what might-have-been. And what we have been unburdened by. We should be truly grateful.

articles.author: The Globe and Mail
articles.title: The TSX knows the drill when it comes to Trump’s tariffs: Take him seriously, not literally
articles.description: The stock market structure has its drawbacks, but still provides a layer of insulation from the madness
articles.content:
The stock market isn’t the type to take bad news well. Its usual reaction when confronted by some unforeseen menace is to immediately freak out and price in a worst-case scenario.
So, it’s a bit odd to see the Canadian stock market a bastion of calm ... [3953 chars]
